Template

Details

  • Honeycrisp: Template atom
  • Customization: Design tokens and Styles
  • More details

    The visual appearance is modified using design tokens from the Honeycrisp Template atom.

Examples

Guidance

Additional references

  1. Title | domain.com

Accessibility

  • Customization to the visual appearance of the Template has been verified for WCAG 2.1 AA contrast minimum success.
  • The Template examples pass manual audits (WCAG 2.1 AA using axe or Lighthouse).
  • The Template achieves WCAG 2.1 AA resizing success.
    Resizing text up to 200% without loss of content or functionality.
  • The Template passes keyboard interaction tests.
    No keyboard test has been created.
  • The Template passes screen reader interaction tests.

  • Guidance on ensuring Template accessibility has been provided in this documentation.
